categories: Accounting / Auditing / Taxation, Public / Civil Service
description:
Roles & ResponsibilitiesHead (Data Architect)
To architect, design and administer the Whole-of-Government (WOG) enterprise data analytics platform (FI@Gov) for the public sector finance and internal audit community.
The key objective of the AGD-Business Analytics directorate is to transform the finance and audit processes through data analytics, and to drive a data-driven approach in decision making. This includes strengthening data analytics capabilities and competencies to strengthen governance, optimise resource management and drive productivity.
The key roles fulfilled by this job include to:

Administer the development and maintenance of the public sector finance data warehouse and data architecture. This includes developing and implementing best practices to ensure optimal data quality, integrity, governance and system performance.
Drive data integration, data modelling, analytics and reporting deliverables in collaboration with business analysts and technology partners.
Manage large scale development and deployment of big data infrastructure and platform;
Review and govern design principles to ensure quality and performant design of dashboards and tools on the Business Intelligence platform powered by Microstrategy.
Plan and implement the data strategy and technology roadmap for the WOG finance analytics platform. This includes monitoring emerging trends of data analytics technologies, including related technologies in the area of robotics and artificial intelligence, and propose the technology roadmap for adoption and application.
Manage the deployment of advanced analytics applications with data pipelines integrated with the overall enterprise grade system architecture and infrastructure.
Manage a team of data analyst and data scientist, overseeing related projects from end-to-end, including user requirement studies, prototyping, development, testing and deployment.
Ensure proper documentation of the data warehouse and analytics platform, including design architecture, data schema, operations management procedures and system functional specifications.

 
 
Requirement

Good degree from a recognised university in computer science, computer engineering, information technology, or a related field.
At least 10 years of experience on enterprise data solutions and architecture
Competency in Microstrategy architecture is strongly preferred
A good understanding of big data technologies, with at least 3 years of experience in Hadoop ecosystem
Ability to independently architect and maintain a hybrid data platform, integrating Hadoop with SQL data warehouse
A good understanding of business intelligence tools and data science techniques like machine learning and text mining, with competency in open-source scripting language (e.g. R, Python) is advantageous
Experience in vendor management and project management is preferred
Team player who can work well with stakeholders from different public agencies
Self-motivated to learn and keeps up to date with the latest analytical technologies in the industry
Confident communicator, with good writing and presentation skills

If you are shortlisted for the position, you should hear from us within 30 days of the closing date of the advertisement.

Roles & ResponsibilitiesAs part of a cross functional team which uses an analytic agile methodology to develop capabilities based on business needs, you will unravel complex problems, discover insights and identify opportunities using statistical, algorithmic, mining and visualisation techniques. In addition to advanced analytic skills, this role is also proficient in integrating and preparing large, varied datasets, architecting specialised database and computing environments, and communicating results. Based on your expertise of statistical knowledge, you will lead discovery processes with stakeholders to identify business requirements and the expected outcome, models and frames business scenarios that are meaningful and which impact on critical business processes and decisions. Critical to this position is the ability to come up with solutions to loosely defined business problems by leveraging pattern detection over potentially large datasets. You will work closely with clients, data stewards, other data scientists, project/program managers, and other IT teams to turn data into critical information and knowledge that can be used to make sound organisational decisions. Other responsibilities include proposing innovative ways to look at problems by using data mining approaches; validate findings using an experimental and iterative approach; present back the findings to the business by exposing their assumptions and validation work in a way that can be easily understood by their business counterparts; product solution and delivery; actively participating in Design Solution thinking; contribute to vision, roadmap, and content presentations and ensuring solution provided meets the customer needs.Requirements Degree in Information Systems, Product Management or Human Computer Interaction disciplines; or Three-year degree in Computer Interaction disciplines or related field. Experienced in quantitative and qualitative research and analytics Solid knowledge of statistical techniques Strong programming skills (such as Hadoop MapReduce or other big data frameworks, Java), statistical modelling (like SAS or R) Experience using machine learning algorithms High proficiency in the use of statistical packages Proficiency in statistical analysis, quantitative analytics, forecasting/predictive analytics, multivariate testing, and optimization algorithms Strong communication and interpersonal skills

company: INTERNATIONAL SOS TECHNOLOGY SERVICES PTE. LTD.
description: Roles & ResponsibilitiesAs a part of the Enterprise Applications Leadership Team, ensure that Application technologies and analytics are managed to the right service levels, enhanced to service the business lines and functions, and implemented according to the architecture standards, contributing to the business strategy. There is a need to hire for the position of Director – Application Technology in International SOS.   The role supports the architecture team with alignment of the technologies against the architecture standards and roadmaps. Supports the business and function demand management process to determine solution options that fit with the technology roadmap and service levels. Supports the operations team with managing vendors to operate with acceptable service levels.  Technology Roadmap  Within the overall guidelines of the Enterprise Architectural framework and standards, set and maintain a portfolio management approach across the business lines and corporate functions, ensuring that the portfolio of technology is aligned with business strategy and is making the maximum possible contribution to the strategic goals and targets of the organization.       Service Management  Work with vendors to report against SLAs, project delivery, and other metrics for service performance Oversee vendors in responding to service-level issues and work to restore normal service operations Work with vendors, service desk management, and infrastructure teams to develop and maintain procedures for incident triage and management, metric and measure creation, management and administration of monitoring tools Actively manage relationship with key stakeholders, business, resolver groups, and escalation points Represent production support to organization ensuring that high-availability and the ability to identify customer-facing issues is included in the development or deployment of new products and services.       Technology Management  Accountable for the technology for Enterprise Apps, roadmaps, documentation, and standards, in alignment with Architecture team Work with Enterprise and Solution Architects to determine applicability, reach, and lifespans of products and platforms in International SOS Support data analytics team with roadmaps, modernization, and provisioning of data from Enterprise Applications, in collaboration with Enterprise Data Architect and GM Data Analytics Assist business reporting teams to review data insights, analysis, and reporting results Work with external parties and Data Analytics team to provision reports, reporting programs, data analytics, data mining, and other insights to the business teams Works with Infrastructure teams to ensure Products/Platforms are following networking safeguards to reduce the risk of outside breaches and protect sensitive internal and external client information.       Finance Management   Participate in the procurement process with business owner(s), procurement officer, and Legal, from clarifying a specification to placing contracts, including identifying opportunities for business improvement. Maintain long term investment portfolio perspectives balancing growth, maintenance, innovation and productivity initiatives as it pertains to the technology products. Ensure all expenditure is compliant with the prevailing GAAP.         RequirementsTo be considered for the role, your skills expertise will be in the following,  At least 12- 15 years in service industries coupled with IT and Business educational degree level or master’s program. Close working relationships with business lines or clients, Delivery of global, large-scale and complex change programmes. Geographical awareness and cultural sensitivity, Successful track record of leading a large team or department. Technology background and Experience managing vendors delivering solutions using following technology or similar technologies will be required.  Required Skills and Knowledge  Solid understanding of wide variety of technologies, including key ones in the list of Microsoft, Salesforce, Mulesoft, Outsystems, Oracle, etc. General management, Quality & business process improvement. Customer service delivery.  Required Competencies   Business acumen and analytical skills Project management Hands-on with a strong sense of urgency, and willing to “roll sleeves up.” Structured approach to service delivery Strong people manager and team player Ability to communicate verbally and in writing with clarity, brevity and accuracy Ability to multi-task and work under pressure within a matrix structure

Roles & ResponsibilitiesAbout the Job  Design and build data driven systems for risk control, fraud detection, recommendation, customer segmentation, adaptive pricing etc. Build, validate, test, and deploy models and algorithms. Work with backend engineers to architect data storage and processing pipelines. Work with product managers to develop new product features based on insights from data. RequirementsWhat You Should Have   Master or PhD in computer science, statistics, mathematics, or fields related to data mining preferred. Experience in Python or R. Knowledge in supervised/unsupervised learning, classification/clustering algorithms, feature engineering/optimization Experience in deep learning, reinforcement learning, personalized search and recommendation, user/seller behavior modeling, marketing algorithms preferred. Experience of Hadoop, Spark, Tensorflow is a plus. Experience with visualization software to convert models/insights into simple, business sell-in stories would be an advantage (but not mandatory). Outstanding analytical and problem-solving skills. Self-motivated, innovative, and proactive. Willing to learn new knowledge and explore unfamiliar domains.    Join us and get:  A chance to lead and grow quickly to transform a nascent InsurTech industry To contribute to the development of high-impact FinTech products that will serve millions of customers across asia To work, play and hustle with a creative, fun and diverse community (think Silicon Valley, Europe and Asia all-in-one!)

Roles & Responsibilities The Office for Insights and Analytics spearheads analytics projects to improve the quality and experience of patient care, and increase efficiency and utility of resources.  As part of the team to drive analytics work, you will use advanced data science techniques, including statistical modelling, data mining, and machine learning, and develop data models and algorithms. You will be involved in architecting specialised databases and computing environments, developing methodologies, and performing analysis. You will also assist to formulate hypotheses, develop prototypes, as well as validate and refine solutions. You will assess the data to draw conclusions, develop actionable recommendations and present data insights to management and stakeholders.Requirements PhD, Masters or Bachelors in quantitative disciplines, such as Economics, Statistics, Biostatistics, Bioinformatics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering, Business Analytics, Information System, Operation Research, Physics At least 6 years of hands-on analytical experience in data modelling and predictive analysis Deep understanding of statistical modelling, machine learning, or data mining, text mining concepts and a track record of solving problems with these methods Proficiency in data science tools such as R, SAS, SPSS and Python. Knowledge of big data techniques (such as Hadoop, MapReduce, Hive, Pig, Spark), deep learning, Business intelligence or Visualisation tool (such as OBIEE, Tableau, D3.js) is an advantage Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Strong team player

Roles & ResponsibilitiesIN THIS POSITION YOU WILL:  Work closely with a world-class global engineering team, business leaders, and the richest data sets in industry to help solve real life problems Develop robust Analytics solutions using state-of-the art algorithms and platforms in Machine Learning and Optimisation, to generate insight and foresight about our business Work with Cloud based Big Data platforms and tools to design and deploy applications in collaboration with a global IT team Apply best practices to manage solution implementations including code design and reviews Experience the excitement of working on a variety of real-world business data challenges, with like-minded data enthusiasts both within the organisation and our external collaboration network, and the opportunity to make a positive impact on business through cutting-edge Analytics apps. Experience in analyzing different data types including but not limited to real-time sensor data, system logs, market data including commodities demand/supply, images and text Strong expertise in advanced statistical methods for data analysis / feature engineering / modeling / forecasting Conduct  testing / validation of Machine Learning models, model tuning and parameter optimisation Experience in implementing scalable solutions using R/Python/Scala/Spark/Hadoop on batch & real-time data and deploying on Cloud platforms using different PAAS services Demonstrable experience in delivering end-to-end data science projects collaborating directly with both technical and business stakeholders RequirementsKEY REQUIREMENTS:  MS or PhD in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or a related field with solid exposure to Machine Learning and/or Optimisation applications At least 5 years of experience of developing Machine Learning and Optimisation solutions and software applications in Utilities / Energy / Power Gen or related industries Hands-on knowledge of working with scalable platforms for processing large and/or complex multi-source data sets Good hands-on technical knowledge in Machine Learning technologies Working experience in implementing ML solutions using one/more techniques from Regression Modeling, Classification, Function Approximation, Optimisation, Deep Learning Ability to clearly communicate business benefits and recommendations based on the results of data analytics projects Ability to communicate analytics-based insights to business stakeholder is preferred Good experience in coaching and mentoring junior direct reports Team player with good interpersonal, communication, and problem solving skills

company: INTERNATIONAL SOS TECHNOLOGY SERVICES PTE. LTD.
description: Roles & ResponsibilitiesYour primary responsible will be    In this role you will be responsible for designing and delivering the data analytics projects and environment across the group. Based upon an understanding of business needs, the Data Architect / Lead designs the technical solution, including data lake and the data warehouse requirements, for data analytics projects. The Data Architect / Lead promotes the data analytics vision and strategy. He / She is a senior hands-on and result-oriented leader that ensures successful delivery of data analytics projects. The Data Architect / Lead is a champion for global data management, governance, quality and data related vendor relationships across the enterprise. He / She oversees a team of ETL, Visualization and DB engineers to deliver data analytics projects for the organisation. Design the technical solution, including data lake and the data warehouse requirements, for data analytics projects and Ensure Data Analytics projects are bringing measurable business value and meeting business stakeholder expectations. Achieve Data Analytics project objectives e.g. delivery dates, budget target and data quality goals. Champion the use of Data Analytics and models to provide effective and relevant information to the business Deliver the enterprise view of the creation, management, storage and use of Data within the organization and communicate the value of data from all aspects customer service to executive management. RequirementsTo be considered for this role, requirements / Technical skills required are:  You shall have minimum of 12+ years of work experience in IT Industry coupled with Bachelors or Master degree in Computer science or related filed of study. Ability to drive large, cross-functional data analytics programs involving coordination with multiple stakeholders, Ability to implement the data analytics strategic vision and translate it into tactical implementable steps. Certification in data analytics and understanding of the various technologies of data analytics within an organization. Experience in translating business requirements into conceptual, logical and physical data models. Experience in designing and building databases for storage or processing, reporting and analytics purpose. Experience in Developing strategies for operational and reporting database implementation, data acquisition and access, and data archiving and recovery. Demonstrable experience in dimensional modelling, and delivering BI solutions, Knowledgeable in integration tools like SSIS, Talend etc. as well as SSRS, SSAS, technologies.

Roles & ResponsibilitiesRole Description: The Inside Sales BI Analyst creates a strategy for customer interaction (through Account Manager and technology activities) for the purpose of increased retention, satisfaction or revenue.  They live and breathe the client’s value proposition, by reviewing and analysing the benefits that can be delivered to the existing customer base.  Through in depth analysis of usage data and risk profiles, the analyst designs a series of sales playbooks and aligns their team to leverage that value proposition, with the intention to grow the existing customer base.  The analyst leverages the client’s messaging and marketing collateral to ensure that a series of sales play books are delivered to the highest possible standards in line with their brand values. Responsibilities:  Create sales plays that eliminate risk of customer churn and address customer satisfaction and retention Leverage of propensity modelling to identify which products to pitch to which customers Design account reviews for key high value customers and email campaigns for customers with low annual spend Review usage data (where possible) to design sales playbooks that relate to customer interaction with a particular product or service Design playbook briefs and call briefs and deploy with sales team Creating customer engagement programmes (or marketing campaigns) Benchmark Customer (both internal and external peers) Utilise existing KPIs from Service Source whitepapers or identify alternatives that are suitable   Report on and track revenue generating programs/campaigns Publish specific dashboards/balanced scorecards with key metrics and conclusions Produce account insight for QBRs (quarterly business review) Collaborate with client on a project bases Market Basket Analysis to drive Sales Volume Define/ Influence sales metrics and measurement (diagnose root-causes, devising solutions, and pushing execution) Train/Coach sales force on effective report and dashboard utilization (create smart sales initiatives) RequirementsGeneral Qualifications: Bachelor degree, preferably in computer science or Finance, or equivalent, or 8+ years of experience in campaign /marketing management, business analytics, dashboard design experience (preferably supporting a sales organization but not essential). Competencies:  Self-motivated with the ability to multitask to meet deadlines Comfortable and flexible working in a fast paced environment Ability to meet many deadlines. Being able to juggle it all is crucial to the job Positive “can do” attitude and highly analytical; enjoys challenges Excellent communication skills – verbal and written Ability to manage multiple stakeholders internal and external Detail oriented and comfortable working with large data sets Proven track record demonstrating an aptitude to analyse trends, compile data into comprehensive reports, and making recommendations based off findings Excellent communication skills – written and verbal with an ability to convey complex information to a broad audience Proven knowledge and effective use of MS office applications  Demonstrated high level of proficiency in CRM, MS office (advanced Excel), SQL and Tableau (or similar) Strong interpersonal skills with ability to work independently and within a team Committed to diverse workforce and inclusivity.

job_title: CyberSecurity Big Data Developer, Vice President
description: Roles & ResponsibilitiesJPMorgan Chase & Co. (NYSE: JPM) is a leading global financial services firm with assets of $2.5 trillion and operations worldwide. The firm is a leader in investment banking, financial services for consumers and small business, commercial banking, financial transaction processing, and asset management. A component of the Dow Jones Industrial Average, JPMorgan Chase & Co. serves millions of consumers in the United States and many of the world's most prominent corporate, institutional and government clients under its J.P. Morgan and Chase brands. Information about JPMorgan Chase & Co. is available at www.jpmorganchase.com. J.P. Morgan is a place for talented people from all backgrounds and perspectives because our clients come from all backgrounds and perspectives. We encourage a culture of inclusion, where everyone's opinion counts and all employees have the freedom to deliver their absolute best. This is why we work hard and invest in attracting and developing a diverse workforce. Learn more about our Business Resource Groups in how they help our employees build successful careers and reach their greatest potential. Working in Cybersecurity takes pure passion for technology, speed, a constant desire to learn, and above all, vigilance in keeping every last asset safe and sound. You’ll be on the front lines of innovation, working with a highly-motivated team laser-focused on analyzing, designing, developing and delivering solutions built to stop adversaries and strengthen our operations. Your research and work will ensure stability, capacity and resiliency of our products and emerging industry trends. Working in tandem with your internal team, as well as technologists and innovators across our global network, your ability to identify threats, provide intelligent analysis and positive actions will stop adversaries and strengthen our data. This role requires a wide variety of strengths and capabilities, including:  Knowledge of Cybersecurity organization practices, operations, risk management processes, principles, architectural requirements, engineering and threats and vulnerabilities, including incident response methodologies Ability to collaborate with high-performing teams and individuals throughout the firm to accomplish common goals Proficiency in the use of skills tools, staying current with skills, participating in multiple forums Experience with Agile and can work with at least one of the common frameworks is highly desired. Ability to analyze vulnerabilities, threats, designs, procedures and architectural design, producing reports and sharing intelligence  Job Description:  Focus on the development of tools and technologies that are at the core of the company’s capabilities to manage, monitor and hunt for cyber security incidents. Architecture and development of large scale solution (big data) to be used in a very large production environment System, network and application troubleshooting Provide engineering support for cyber security products developed RequirementsSkills required:  Strong research, analytical and problem solving skills Independent problem-solving, highly motivated and self-directing Ability to write and debug administrative and reporting tools in some programming languages (Shell/Perl or Python,  Scala/Java/R, C/C++,  HTML5, or other experiences acceptable) Comfortable with most aspect of operating system administration such as tweaking, hardening and configuring services A solid understanding of Unix-based operating systems, including paging/swapping, IPC, drivers and filesystem (inode, partitions, etc.) Experience with host and network security (identity/password management, ACLs, file permissions and integrity) Strong interpersonal and communication skills; capable of writing documentation, training users in complex topics, making presentations to  junior and very senior audience Ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced environment while remaining productive and professional; exercise patience and ability to multi task 	   Skills desired  Having skills in the below areas is a major plus that will help the candidate integrate within the team and environment but is *not a requirement*. Experience with hadoop ecosystem: Hadoop, Spark, Map/Reduce, Hive/Pig, Impala/Drill, etc. Experience with Data Science:  MLlib, Scikit, h2o, TensorFlow, Caffe, Singa, etc. Experience with NoSQL stacks: Elasticsearch, MongoDB, etc. Experience with SIEM products: Qradar, Arcsight, Splunk, etc. Experience with messaging and data transport tools: Kafka, NiFi, LogStash, Syslog-ng, rsyslog, etc. Experience with Link Analysis tools and GraphDBs Experience with data visualization tools: Hue, Kibana, Qlikview, Tableau, etc. Knowledge in RIA: HTML5, node.js, bootstrap, angular, extJS, etc.  Your expertise in cyber, combined with your desire to provide innovative security services, will be an asset to our Cybersecurity team. Help deliver high-quality security solutions across all our lines of business around the world by creating, designing, implementing, and maintaining next-level technology. The work you’ll do is vital, as it will protect over $18 trillion of assets under custody and $393 billion in deposits every day.  We strongly encourage all applicants to apply via our careers website where you are able join our Talent Network to receive customized vacancy notifications and ensure that your details are accessible by our global recruiting team - www.jpmorganchase.com/careers. A quick link to this particular job posting can be found in this URL: http://jobs.jpmorganchase.com/ListJobs/ByKeyword/180037644/ Please note that only short-listed candidates will be notified. We thank you for your interest and wish you all the best in your career. Yours Sincerely, Human Resources JPMorgan

job_title: SVP, Infrastructure Lead, Group Consumer Banking and Big Data Analytics Technology, T&O (180004MI)
address: MARINA BAY FINANCIAL CENTRE, 12 MARINA BOULEVARD 018982
description: Roles & ResponsibilitiesBusiness Function     Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.   Job Purpose    DBS Corebanking team is seeking a highly motivated, seasoned manager of infrastructure to transform and build out our Corebanking’s existing infrastructure into cloud platform infrastructure.  This person will lead DevOps engineers as they design and deploy automation and configuration management tools needed to provide a secured, scalable, reliable and fast platform for both our infrastructure and application services.     The successful candidate will have extensive experience managing infrastructure for secured, global, large scale, highly available services.  Technical and organizational vision, combined with flawless execution is critical to this role.  The role also requires strong partnership with engineering/development teams, production support, technical services support and vendors. Responsibilities     As part of the Corebanking leadership team, drive the platform transformation to private/public cloud Manage a team of infrastructure engineers to ensure the stability and high availability of infrastructure services for Corebanking applications Build and foster a high performance culture, mentor team members and provide team with the tools and guidance to transform current infrastructure platform  Design, build and deliver a stable and highly scalable infrastructure based on latest technologies and best practice  Enhance performance throughout the infrastructure using automation framework and implement tooling to optimize performance, availability and costs Plan, lead and drive projects through entire lifecycle for infrastructure Create deployment strategies for existing and new services based on business objectives Foster collaborative partnerships across functional teams including remote teams Requirements Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent work experience At least 10+ years of experience in web/cloud operations, administration and/or engineering with organizational leadership of large scale, global services More than 15+ years of infrastructure engineering management experience Hands-on experience scaling and managing cloud-based infrastructure will be  added advantage Solid foundation in software engineering best practices Experience with Scrum and agile development processes and methodologies Well versed in tooling automation and CI/CD pipelines Solid understanding of highly available, performant and secured service delivery Thorough understanding of networking concepts, Internet protocols and network security  Hands-on experience with modern container orchestration systems Clear communicator with a positive attitude Team worker with good interpersonal skills, to facilitate working within the department, across the broader T&O department and with business partners and vendors.

Roles & Responsibilities Drive the overall data strategy across AIA including, but not limited to: usage of data for analytics/BI, single customer view, master data management, big data, data warehouse, and cloud. Work collaboratively with your Data, Analytics and BI colleagues to deliver on your objectives and openly share knowledge amongst the organisation. Build and maintain strong effective relationships with key internal and external stakeholders to ensure that your data platform solutions meet the expectation of key business stakeholders. Assess and understand the business requirements through liaison with the business stakeholders, Business Analysts and the Project Managers. Support the Enterprise Data and Analytics COE in terms data acquisition and structuring data fit for use on analytics projects. Pursue personal development of skills and knowledge for the effective performance of the role. Other tasks or responsibilities assigned from time to time by management. Timeliness of completion of deliverables   Effective stakeholder management Achieve planned benefits realization Effective problem solving through self or with teams Requirements Bachelor degree and above in Analytics, Information Systems Management, Computer Science or related fields. 7+ years of experience in data warehouse, data analytics projects, change management process, and/or any IM (Information Management) related projects. Technical experience in data migration, data integration, data modeling, designing, building ETLs, data ingestions, and/or transformations. Experience in working with RDBMS such as DB2, Oracle, Microsoft SQL Server, PostgresSQL, Teradata, etc. Experience in data management and integration tool such as Informatica Data Integrator, Oracle Data Integrator, SAP Data Services, Ab Initio, IBM Datastage or Microsoft SSIS. Process good knowledge and experience in data quality definition, data cleansing and data treatment/profiling process using industry standard tools like Informatica Data Quality, Trillium Software, SAS Data Quality, SAP Data Quality Management, etc. is an advantage. Good knowledge of data warehouse and data management implementation methodology. Good knowledge of the Information Management framework, including operating model, data governance, data management, data security, data quality and data architecture. Preferably with experience in Big Data environments like Cloudera and HortonWorks. Knowledge or experience of cloud computing is advantageous. Process good knowledge and experience in data visualisation concepts using tools such as SAS Visual Analytics or WRS, Tableau, Microsoft PowerBI or Reporting Services, IBM Cognos, SAP BusinessObjects, etc. is an advantage. Ability to pick up new tools and able to be independent with minimal guidance from the project leads/managers.

Roles & ResponsibilitiesAspenTech is a leading supplier of software that optimizes process manufacturing – including oil and gas, petroleum, chemicals, pharmaceuticals and other industries that manufacture and produce products from a chemical process. With integrated aspenONE solutions, process manufacturers can implement best practices for optimizing their engineering, manufacturing and supply chain operations. As a result, AspenTech customers are better able to increase capacity, improve margins, reduce costs and become more energy efficient. In addition, the launch of the Asset Performance Management (APM) suite supports corporate reliability initiatives, taking an analytics-driven approach to asset availability. It combines deep process modeling expertise with real time big data to extend asset life and effectiveness. APM enables you to accurately predict and eliminate the root cause of all failures, so the only downtime you experience is the downtime you plan. Director, Business Consulting role provides technical, business, industry and management support to the AspenTech Sales, Services and Business Consulting (BC) team in selling to and servicing our customers. It is primarily a customer facing role that requires both excellent industry business and technical knowledge allied to the communication skills needed to position Aspentech solutions and services with our customers. The successful candidate must have strong business acumen and customer interaction skills. The role requires the ability to understand customer challenges and industry drivers, formulate potential solutions from Aspen's portfolio, build and justify the business case for client investment, and provide support to the direct sales force in the sales process. Responsibilities: Business  Manage a team of Business Consultants to grow AspenTech business in APAC through working closely with Sales Account Team. The pre-sales functions include pipeline development, solution seminar, marketing campaign, proposal preparation, technical presentation and clarification, product demo etc. Assign and coordinate individual Business Consultants based on strategic priorities to meet both country and APAC goals and objectives. Work closely with Country Manager to do Business Planning and Strategy for Business Development. Work closely with VP of sales and Business Operations, seek support and report diligently to meet country and overall APAC goals. Develop the skillsets required for the junior/new hired Business Consultant Keep updated for the team with the relevant technology development Be a leader and a role model to inspire passion to drive country goals and meet objectives. Timely reporting and be an advocate for corporate compliance. Attend Forecast calls, Business/Account Review and Planning.  Technical    Apply consultative skills in customer-facing situations to identify customer problems and understand their business and operational issues. Facilitate customer understanding of Product solution technical functionality, value creation and business process improvement. Articulate the overall solution architecture and provide the solution vision with an understanding of the customer's business and technology needs, AspenTech's previous successes and the competitive landscape. Ability to cultivate deep relationship with customers at different levels and be the trusted advisor to the customer.   Requirements B.S. in Chemical Engineering with 15+ years practical experience in consulting, application software technology, and/or industry, with direct implementation experience. Minimum of 10-12 years’ experience in Advanced Process Control or Manufacturing Supply Chain Area. Strong people management and development skill. Domain expertise required. Possesses strong executive presence with ability to establish and cultivate effective relationships at executive level, both within the organization and externally. Ability to lead cross functional teams and manage multiple priorities under pressure. Strong business acumen. Adept at performing customer interviews, identifying improvement opportunities, and overcoming resistance to change. Ability to assess and articulate customer value creation. Must possess a strong passion for cutting-edge technologies, with the aptitude and desire to learn new skills. Strong influencing skills. Able to demonstrate best practice negotiation methodologies. Strong communication skills both written and verbal. Flexibility to travel 30-50% of time.    PLEASE NOTE:  This job description is intended to describe the general nature and level of the work to be performed by any person employed in this role.  This job description is not intended to be a specific or exhaustive list of all duties and responsibilities required.  Aspen Technology reserves the right in its sole discretion to add to, reduce from, or make changes to this job description, and/or to the actual duties performed by the employee, as necessary to meet business and organizational needs.   Aspen Technology is an affirmative action, equal opportunity employer.

Roles & ResponsibilitiesAspenTech is a leading supplier of software that optimizes process manufacturing – including oil and gas, petroleum, chemicals, pharmaceuticals and other industries that manufacture and produce products from a chemical process. With integrated aspenONE solutions, process manufacturers can implement best practices for optimizing their engineering, manufacturing and supply chain operations. As a result, AspenTech customers are better able to increase capacity, improve margins, reduce costs and become more energy efficient. In addition, the launch of the Asset Performance Management (APM) suite supports corporate reliability initiatives, taking an analytics-driven approach to asset availability. It combines deep process modeling expertise with real time big data to extend asset life and effectiveness. APM enables you to accurately predict and eliminate the root cause of all failures, so the only downtime you experience is the downtime you plan. We are now seeking a Technical Support Consultant, to provide technical support and training to customers using the Aspen Technology Engineering & Simulation software suite. Reporting to the Manager, this Consultant is responsible for resolving customer concerns within the assigned customer base to meet or exceed customer service requirements and drive customers’ product usage and adoption.  Work with customers on technical issues received via phone call, web chat and e-mail. Complete research and provide solutions to customers within defined period. Achieve Support Operational Target and Business KPI like SLO / Customer satisfaction on quarterly and annual basis. Communicate effectively and efficiently to customers and internal staffs. Create the product solutions and Knowledge base articles for customer access via Support web site. Participate with Product Beta testing and help to improve the product quality. Deliver the product trainings at the office and customer site in Worldwide to meet the demand from customer. Deliver the training by virtual and face to face. Knowledge transfer for internal staff. Provide necessary Sales Support by Demonstrating Product functions, Demo and presentation. Requirements BS / B Tech / BE in Chemical Engineering minimum. Master Degree or higher qualification is advantage. Excellent communication in English language, customer relationship and troubleshooting skills are essential. Minimum Experience required is : 5-10 years in the field of Process Modeling and Simulation using Aspen Tech products and suites Operation experiences in process industries are added advantage Experience in Teaching or training delivery is added advantage. No restriction for business trip and the work place is Singapore. Able to communicate in second language is added advantage (Chinese, Korean, or Japanese).  Specific Product Knowledge:  Knowledge and working of Process Modeling and Optimization using Aspen Plus & Aspen Plus Dynamics is Essential. Knowledge about Programming language (VBA and/or Python) is essential. Knowledge about Heat Exchanger design and rating and related tools are added advantage.

Roles & ResponsibilitiesTypically after a year of on the job training, a Data Scientist on the Technical Services team is able to:     ●    Digest Client’s Google Analytics (GA) and Google Tag Manager (GTM) implementation and identify areas of opportunity within Client data to recommend strategic solutions ●    Develop apps (visualization, routing data, cleaning data, access to data, interacting with data) for analytics platforms ●    Develop various Big Data capabilities in the cloud for our Clients, aligning them with business strategies and requirements ●    Architect solutions for massive scale, resiliency and maintainability, leveraging various cloud providers which meet technical, security, and business needs for applications and workloads ●    Execute strategic engineering proof of concepts and contribute to technology strategy and engineering roadmaps ●    Translate solutions and complicated concepts to all audiences, from executive level members to marketing teams ●    Other duties as assignedRequirementsCollege degree, preferably in Computer Science, Information Science - OR - equivalent experience in Web or Mobile Development ●    Experience with Python, SQL, Java or Google BigQuery ●    Machine Learning Framework experience ●    Proven ability to solve complex problems with on-time delivery, the highest quality, and creativity in the approach ●    Ability to listen and understand business needs and creatively develop solutions ●    Ability to work on a team and manage individual prioritized workload ●    Cloud infrastructure experience ●    Strong desire to become a proficient Data Scientist for a fast paced company

job_title: VP / AVP,  Sr. Frontend Developer,  Group Consumer Banking and Big Data Analytics Technology (180004F7
description: Roles & ResponsibilitiesKey Accountabilities  DBS Consumer Banking and Group Technology is looking for passionate Frontend Engineers to work on our in-house Web Framework for crafting and assembling our next generation consumer experiences. If you are the kind of engineer who is passionate about bringing great experiences to life and love working in a collaborative environment with your product and experiences, then we want to talk to you.   Responsibilities  Develop applications following best practices of accessibility and test-driven development. Create reusable, testable, organized, efficient, and self-documenting code/components. Partner closely with design and product teams to craft product experiences while providing technical guidance and solutions  Deliver code in a DevOps environment. Encourage code craftsmanship across team. Deliver code in an agile team environment. Lead code reviews to drive teams to the highest standards for web apps. Drive teams to follow clean code principles.   Requirements 7+ years professional application/frontend development experience. Hands on experience on at least two of the following JavaScript frameworks     EMBERJS REACTJS ANGULAR (1.x or >2) BACKBONE DOJO   A sound understanding of Redux, Webpack, Styled-components, ES6, Jest. A solid experience building applications on top of RESTful APIs. NodeJS Experience Experience in UI testing and Code Quality Tools (Jasmine, Mocha, Cucumber, BDD, TDD, JSLINT, etc...) Understand the paradigms and techniques associated with web page performance and degradation; how to analyze, apply measures, and resolve bottlenecks Demonstrable experience in Object Oriented JavaScript without the use of a library or framework     Able to explain advanced concepts native to the JavaScript language - understanding of ECMA6 Standards is a big plus Able to follow best coding practice with JavaScript. ie: avoiding global variables, namespaces, modularity, inheritance, performance, closures     Solid knowledge of algorithms, design patterns, and componentization approaches. Experience with cross-browser, cross-platform, and design constraints on the web. Experience with CSS pre-processors (SASS, LESS) Ability to operate effectively both independently and within a team environment Cloud experience a big plus

Roles & ResponsibilitiesAssociate Marketing Operations Analyst   Talend is a rapidly growing leader in the cloud, data and application integration space. We are a global company with offices in Redwood City, Paris, London, Bonn, Beijing, Tokyo, Singapore, Sydney, and Bangalore. Our customers are thought leaders in data integration, cloud, and big data, and they represent some of the biggest and best names in retail, financial services, consumer products, and business services. We enable data driven companies to be more effective at what they do by providing them with the tools, infrastructure, and guidance to make informed business decisions. Our architecture and technology uniquely position us to take advantage of constant innovation in data and processing technologies, such as Hadoop and Spark. As a result, we provide the fastest, most scalable data integration platform in the industry, and we support Big Data natively. Data, analytics, and predictable forecasts are becoming ever more important to us as our company reaches its next phase of maturity and reporting requirements.RequirementsThe Marketing Operations Specialist, based in Singapore, is part of the Demand Generation Marketing department and directly reports to the Global Marketing Programs Manager, based in California.   This is a hands-on role which will play an integral part in building operational structure of programs in Marketo, help maintain data integrity, and overall support for the Demand Generation Marketing team. Training Field Marketing team when necessary on marketing automation and reporting processes, systems, and working cross-functionally with our Sales Operations team.   The Role  Develop/maintain templates in Marketo to streamline the work and ensure best practices are being used Review and test existing marketing programs to optimize workflow and tracking Support the Demand Generation teams worldwide with any custom requirements they may have with regional programs. Seek out industry best practices and incorporate relevant ideas Work cross-functionally with the Sales Operations and Reporting teams to ensure smooth flow of information between the teams    Requirements of the role  Basic understanding of current online marketing concepts, strategy and best practices 1-3 years of experience working in a B2B marketing or sales environment (preferred) Experience working with Marketo, or other marketing automation tool a plus Familiarity with Salesforce, or other CRM Experience with data-input, data-cleansing and data-maintenance (preferred) Enthusiastic and passionate with a drive and desire to succeed Strongly detail-oriented with good analytical skills Very self-motivated as direct manager is in USA Open to frequent extended travel for training Able to work as part of the team or on own initiative Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with confidence in dealing with people of all levels Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience    Talend is an equal opportunity employer committed to making all employment decisions on the basis of merit, capability and equality of opportunity, and without regard to race/ethnicity, gender, pregnancy, gender identity or expression, color, creed, religion, national origin, age, disability, marital status (including domestic partnerships and civil unions), sexual orientation, military veteran status, unemployment status, or any other basis prohibited by federal, state or local law, or any other characteristic that has no bearing on a person’s ability to perform his or her job.

Roles & ResponsibilitiesTalend is a rapidly growing leader in the cloud, data and application integration space. We are a global company with offices in Redwood City, Paris, London, Bonn, Beijing, Tokyo, Singapore, Sydney, and Bangalore. Our customers are thought leaders in data integration, cloud, and big data, and they represent some of the biggest and best names in retail, financial services, consumer products, and business services. We enable data driven companies to be more effective at what they do by providing them with the tools, infrastructure, and guidance to make informed business decisions. Our architecture and technology uniquely position us to take advantage of constant innovation in data and processing technologies, such as Hadoop and Spark. As a result, we provide the fastest, most scalable data integration platform in the industry, and we support Big Data natively. Data, analytics, and predictable forecasts are becoming ever more important to us as our company reaches its next phase of maturity and reporting requirements.RequirementsSENIOR RECRUITER, APAC - Base in SIngapore   The team at Talend is growing and we’re rapidly expanding in AsiaPac with office locations now in Singapore, Tokyo, Bangalore, Beijing and Sydney. We are looking for a Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist to join our growing Singapore office. This is a key hire for our team. You will be playing a vital and very visible role in helping to attract and hire the best talent in the India market. This is a unique opportunity to get in early with a high growth technology company in a very impactful Talent Acquisition role.   What You’ll Be Working On:  Partner with our hiring managers to execute on hiring goals and targets across AsiaPac, and into emerging markets in the region Own full-cycle recruiting for the region including req intake, writing job descriptions, posting open positions, sourcing, phone screening, scheduling interviews, gathering interview feedback, negotiating offers, etc. Oversee and manage various recruitment channels including LinkedIn Recruiter, online Job Boards, and agencies including tracking and reporting of recruitment pipeline for all positions Provide Talent advisory, support and guidance to hiring managers and candidates Support hiring managers by conducting reference checks and other activities as required Constantly improve recruiting processes Be knowledgeable about our business and why people should work here Manage the existing pipeline of candidates and identify what future opportunities they may be a fit for    A Little About You:  This isn’t your first dance with Recruiting in your career. You’ve got some serious moves – but always have a desire to learn and do more You bring 6+ years of in-house recruiting experience for a fast-paced and growing technology and/or SaaS company, specifically supporting professional services and technical roles. You have a clear understanding of the AsiaPac talent market conditions and know the requirements to hire in those markets (i.e. immigration policy, legal & compliance issues, and market compensation) You understand and are very passionate about how critical a role of the recruiter is in growing a company You view your working relationship with your hiring managers as a partnership and they consider you to be an extension of their team. You know employment branding is important to attraction efforts, and you can creatively market the company and your open roles across a variety of platforms You love the art of sourcing, and pride yourself on finding and engaging with talent others only hope to connect with. You are constantly staying up-to-date on the latest recruiting trends and techniques. You know how to leverage social recruiting resources and in-house tools to identify and recruit the very best candidates. Candidate experience is incredibly important to you – and you get how it can really impact the Talent Acquisition function You believe that there is always a solution to any challenge– and work with your hiring manager as a true partner in engaging great talent You are game to travel when required to get the job done You thrive in a startup culture, and adapt to the changing needs of the business as we scale.  You are willing to pitch in and do what it takes to help your colleagues across the HR Business Partnering team in need of your expertise and partnership

Roles & ResponsibilitiesSUMMARY The Design Engineer (Software) is responsible for understanding of test processes and the underlying systems and data structures. The ideal candidate is adept at using this knowledge and large data to carry out data analysis, trending, forecasting and reporting, data mining and predictive analytics and in doing so provide meaningful management information to be used in the day to day decision making process. We are looking for candidate with strong experience using a variety of data mining/ data analysis methods, using a variety of data tools, building and implementing models, using /creating algorithms and creating/running simulations.   ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES • Responsible for design, develop, test and implement reports and dashboards that utilize the underlying data store(s)/ data warehouse(s)/ data mart(s). o Responsible for data gathering and development of database which include design, develop, test, implement and maintain new and existing databases. o Participate in analysis activities to gather required reporting and dashboard requirements. o Translate requirements into specifications that will be used to implement the required reports and dashboards, created from potentially multiple data sources. o Provide support as required to ensure the availability and performance of developed reports and dashboards for both external and internal users. o Developing predictive model to drive optimization and improvement of processes and resources. o Assess the effectiveness and accuracy of data sources and data gathering techniques. o Continuously improve the quality, accuracy, integrity and value of the data by giving input into the optimizing of data structures and possible integration of data from a variety of diverse systems that exist within the organization. o Conduct big-data analysis to enable predictive forecasting of machine ‘s component failure o Provide technical assistance and cross training to other team members. o Must be able to perform duties with moderate to low supervision.   • Interacting with teams o Work with stakeholders throughout the organization to identify opportunities for leveraging company data to drive solutions. o Able to work effectively within different cross-functional teams within the organization.   • Traveling and onsite support o Able to do frequent business travel within Asia during project pilot build.RequirementsMINIMUM REQUIREMENTS • Bachelor Degree/Msc in Computer Science or other relevant discipline or equivalent combination of education and experience. • 3-5 years of working experience developing and implementing enterprise-scale reports and dashboards. • Extensive experience with data/ database/ data warehouse implementations. • Knowledge of logical and physical data modeling concepts. Big-data analytics and prediction algorithm and methods. • Understanding of data integration issues (validation and cleaning), familiarity with complex data and structures • Requires strong analytical, conceptual and problem-solving abilities. • Ability to manage multiple priorities, assess and adjust quickly to changing priorities. • Possess software coding experience. C++, Python, Java, R, linux and script programming skill.   COMMUNICATION AND LANGUAGE SKILLS -- Oral & Written • Converse, read and write fluently in English. Converse and read in Mandarin is required as this role will need to interact with counterpart/vendors in China. • Ability to work both individually and as part of a team • Excellent interpersonal (verbal and written) communication skills with ability to communicate clearly to cross-functional team within organization or external customer/vendors. • Response professionally/Technically to common inquiries from customers. • Effectively present information to internal teams and management and is a good team player. • Excellent time management skills with the ability to contribute to multiple concurrent projects

Roles & ResponsibilitiesWe're looking for the right individual who has the passion and desire to crack the code for this very hot space in AI and Big Data. 6Estates engineers build tools and solutions that ensure the delivery of high quality software for our stakeholders.  For someone who wants to learn and grow, this role provides you the unique opportunity to work along with all the experts of different fields.  As a Software Engineer, you will work with team of talents to design, architect, and help to maintain Enterprise solutions on the big data analytics platform. You will also touch on researching, introducing new technologies and ideas and integrating your amazing innovations and algorithms into our production systems.Requirements  Minimum Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science.    Excellent implementation skills in Java, Python, Nodejs,C or  C++ .    Expert knowledge of Linux/Unix programming.   Experience in MySql, Redis or other databases.    Experience in Spring, Hibernate or other Java Frameworks is a plus   Good communication skills - Fluent in Chinese and English

Roles & Responsibilities Develop, optimize, and maintain integration solution (ETL Framework) using Talend Technologies (DI, Data Quality, Big Data Platform), SQL Server, Sybase, Oracle, Hadoop, and etc. Gather and Analyze the requirements (business and data) and build quality ETL process that includes standard process such as Audit, Error handling, Alerts, Control Process, and etc. Makes recommendations, based on data profiling and data analysis, for changes to existing/legacy systems particularly in the area of automated data validations. Collaborate, manage, and monitor thousands of Talend ETL jobs such as load data into your Hadoop cluster from various sources. Create detail technical specification, operation guide, and other required/requested documents. Gather and develop metadata (data mapping, data lineage, etc.) and coordinate all the data activities Communicate and work effectively with business, SMEs, Non-Technical, and IT staffs across functional departments. Contribute to the entire implementation process including driving the definition of improvements based on the business needs and architectural improvement. Provide production support such as deployment, change request, monitoring, impact analysis, track issues and prompt defect solution, and recommendation for a preventive measure. Perform all other job duties as assigned by the supervisor. Requirements Bachelor’s Degree of Computer Science or related field At least 2 to 4 years of experience in ETL using Talend (DI and Big Data Platform) and Java for the design, development, testing, and deployment. At least 1 to 2 years of hands-on experience of Windows and Linux Environment. Hands-on experience of data sourcing such as SQL Server, Oracle, Sybase, and etc. Hands-on experience of data integration and data quality platform for relational databases, flat files, cloud apps, and big data platforms. Experience in the design and development of the Data Modeling, ODS, Data warehouse, Big Data, and Data Lake. Experience in handling different types of data and files such as HDFS, Parquet file, JSON data, and other data files (CSV, txt, excel, dat, and etc.) Good experience and exposures in RDBMS, SQL, Hive, Spark, MapReduce, and Big Data (Hadoop). Able to work independently as well as effective team player with strong desire to deliver good results. Adaptive and meticulous with strong analytical skills. Experience working in Agile Environment Hands-on experience in Streaming and Metadata Management using Talend Technologies. Experience in other Programming Languages such as Python, Scala, and etc. Good exposures in Big Data Ecosystem Experience in using Informatica technologies for ETL process and Data Management. Degree in Computer Science or Information Technology or any other related disciplines

Roles & ResponsibilitiesAre you a passionate Linux System Engineer, or DevOps specialist interested in working for a highly agile and growing tech company? Would you like to become part of a collaborative, data analytics start-up engaged with some of the largest and most interesting datasets in the world?   Who are Teralytics? Teralytics is a fast-growing technology start-up with great ambitions in supporting the emerging big data economy. Our products transform the way industries, governments and our society works, utilising real-time data from over 350 million people across multiple countries. We offer our employees unique learning opportunities and the chance to work with technologies such as Ansible, Docker, Mesos, Hadoop, Scala and Spark. Teralytics is funded by international venture capital firms who previously invested in companies such as Facebook, Spotify, Skype and AirBnB.    Your role  Manage and monitor a multi-datacenter environment with an Infrastructure as Code methodology Build automation to prevent problem recurrence and to reduce deployment times and errors Participate in the designs of distributed systems architectures Ensure scalability, availability and performance of Teralytics software stack Engage in service capacity planning and demand forecasting Maintain security, backup, and redundancy strategies RequirementsRequired experience:  MS degree in Computer Science or related technical field, or equivalent practical experience Proven working experience in deployment and fine-tuning of relational databases, in particular PostgreSQL Proven working experience working with Unix/Linux systems Professional experience in managing complex backup solutions and destruction recovery plans Professional experience with monitoring and alerting systems (e.g., Zabbix, Nagios) Networking: experience with network theory e.g. TCP/IP, UDP, ICMP, etc., MAC addresses, IP packets, DNS, OSI layers, and load balancing  Beneficial:  Experience in securing systems and firewall management (e.g., iptables, pf) Experience in management of distributed systems and technologies (e.g., Apache Mesos, Marathon, Hadoop/HDFS, Ceph) Experience with automation software (e.g., Ansible, Puppet, Chef) Experience with virtualization and containerization (e.g., Docker, Vagrant) Experience with service discovery (e.g., Consul) Cloud experience, preferably in AWS/GCE

company: ORACLE CAPAC SERVICES UNLIMITED COMPANY (SINGAPORE BRANCH)
description: Roles & ResponsibilitiesRoles and Responsibilities As part of the Oracle Cloud Platform Solution Engineering team, you will provide presales support to Sales Teams across ASEAN in our portfolio of solutions - including Oracle Cloud Platform (IaaS, PaaS), Middleware, Big Data and Analytics, and Database. Your role is to successfully engage, position and secure technical selection for the solutions from Oracle that span across multiple solution domains. You are expected to work closely with the sales teams, own the solution opportunity from a technical perspective, engage continually with customers and drive the opportunity to sales closure. Some of the responsibilities include the following:   Engaging Internal Stakeholders  Design of FSI, Telco or MRD specific solution road maps, sales plays and reference architectures that differentiate Oracle’s value proposition. Creation of sales kits, customer messaging and delivering sales enablement in ASEAN.  Mentor and coach sales/presales teams to improve industry knowledge and solution selling skill.   Promote industry focused business and technology practices, create and deliver Cloud workshops and demos    Solution Engagement with Customers  Engage with customer accounts to determine/create business needs, identify and develop opportunities, and develop solutions by leveraging Oracle Cloud technology and persuasively articulate meaningful business value to support decision-making at senior levels. Lead cross-LoB solutions/initiatives that address customers’ current and evolving business requirements leveraging Oracle’s entire solution portfolio Articulate Oracle Cloud Solution features, benefits and product roadmap with FSI, Telco or MRD industry specific view. To support POCs and develop prototypes to translate customer requirements to reality Solution support for RFI/RFP including cost-benefit analysis RequirementsSkillsets and Qualifications  The candidate must possess C-Level (CxO, Chief Architect) customer facing skills to engage and drive discussions with senior personnel regarding trade-offs, best practices, and risk mitigation in selecting the right technology platform.  The candidate should demonstrate the ability to think strategically about business, product, and technical challenges when driving deep-dive technical workshops with customers and partners to develop mindshare on Oracle cloud platform solutions.  The candidate should have a strong understanding of enterprise scale solutions and be comfortable with various architecture engagements on topics ranging from cloud computing, improving customer experience, digital transformation, enterprise security, IT strategy, applications strategy, Integration strategy, Information Architecture including big data and enterprise architecture. The candidate must be a self-motivator to keep abreast of developments in the FSI, Telco or MRD industry and technology trends such as blockchain, AI/ML etc.  Excellent presentation and communications skills Minimum 10 years of enterprise and solution architecture experience (implementation/consulting) required. Hands-on experience is a must.  Certification in Enterprise Architecture frameworks such as TOGAF will be an advantage FSI, Telco or MRD industry experience and familiarity with ASEAN market will be an advantage. Excellent leadership and influencing skill to work in a matrix environment across multiple teams. Comfortable to lead virtual teams across LoB. Experience in designing/deploying hybrid/cloud solutions on AWS, Azure, Google, Oracle platforms Relevant Application Development experience – J2EE, API driven architecture, Microservices, Containers, ESB, BPEL, Spark/Hadoop

Roles & Responsibilities Adopt the latest and new technology initiatives (NTI) and ensure that the same are incorporated promptly and effectively in the products and solutions offered by the company.   Operations Research and Optimization (ORO)  Simulation models to evaluate, improve and analyze the efficacy of the ORO models Big Data Analytics Machine Learning based Predictive Analytics Cognitive Technologies/ Artificial Intelligence/ Deep Learning Quantum Computing Any other next‐generation and emerging information technology and advance computing initiatives that will ensure that the company’s products remain state‐of‐the‐art.  Select and recruit a team of appropriate Specialists/ Analysts/ Scientists/ Consultants to undertake the above new technology initiatives. You shall be assisted by the HRD in this task.  Ensure that the innovations based on new technology initiatives are seamlessly and promptly incorporated/ integrated into the mainstream products and solutions of the company, so as to achieve technical superiority over competition.   Plan and budget all the Research & Development (R&D) and Knowledge Acquisition & Learning (K&L) activities so that FIN Dept can make financial provisions for the same. Track and monitor the budgeted activities to make optimum use of time and resources Any other latest information technology based research, development and innovation work that the Board may assign you from time‐to‐time RequirementsQualification Requirement :  Master Degree / Doctorate in OR Science from reputated Universities 10 years releavant experience in Operations Research Worked closely with airline /  air transportation industry Heavy knowledge of aviation

Creation of sales kits, customer messaging and delivering sales enablement in ASEAN.  Mentor and coach sales/presales teams to improve industry knowledge and solution selling skill.   Promote industry focused business and technology practices, create and deliver Cloud workshops and demos    Solution Engagement with Customers  Engage with customer accounts to determine/create business needs, identify and develop opportunities, and develop solutions by leveraging Oracle Cloud technology and persuasively articulate meaningful business value to support decision-making at senior levels. Lead cross-LoB solutions/initiatives that address customers’ current and evolving business requirements leveraging Oracle’s entire solution portfolio Articulate Oracle Cloud Solution features, benefits and product roadmap with FSI, Telco or MRD industry specific view. To support POCs and develop prototypes to translate customer requirements to reality Solution support for RFI/RFP including cost-benefit analysis RequirementsSkillsets and Qualifications  The candidate must possess C-Level (CxO, Chief Architect) customer facing skills to engage and drive discussions with senior personnel regarding trade-offs, best practices, and risk mitigation in selecting the right technology platform.  The candidate should demonstrate the ability to think strategically about business, product, and technical challenges when driving deep-dive technical workshops with customers and partners to develop mindshare on Oracle cloud platform solutions.  The candidate should have a strong understanding of enterprise scale solutions and be comfortable with various architecture engagements on topics ranging from cloud computing, improving customer experience, digital transformation, enterprise security, IT strategy, applications strategy, Integration strategy, Information Architecture including big data and enterprise architecture. The candidate must be a self-motivator to keep abreast of developments in the FSI, Telco or MRD industry and technology trends such as blockchain, AI/ML etc.  Excellent presentation and communications skills Minimum 10 years of enterprise and solution architecture experience (implementation/consulting) required. Hands-on experience is a must.  Certification in Enterprise Architecture frameworks such as TOGAF will be an advantage FSI, Telco or MRD industry experience and familiarity with ASEAN market will be an advantage. Excellent leadership and influencing skill to work in a matrix environment across multiple teams. Comfortable to lead virtual teams across LoB. Experience in designing/deploying hybrid/cloud solutions on AWS, Azure, Google, Oracle platforms Relevant Application Development experience – J2EE, API driven architecture, Microservices, Containers, ESB, BPEL, Spark/Hadoop

Roles & ResponsibilitiesYour profile & role on the project  YOU:   Thrive on challenge. When was the last time you fail?   Are curious & always learning. What are you up to right now?   Can deal with constant change. When were you last surprised?   Have mastered at least one skill of your trade but you’re not defined by it. What can you  teach us? Can you wear many hats?  YOU AGAIN:  Graduated from an Engineering School, you have a proven experience of 2 to 10 years on a  similar position. You are passionate about new technologies and digital innovation. You have  already worked in an Agile environment driven by Time-To-Market, you communicate easily, are  independent and able to make significant proposals. Most importantly, you are somone who  loves CODING!  Within exciting projects, you will initiate development projects, carry out scoping studies,  implement architectures and write architecture documents. You will assist our customers in  adopting the new architecture patterns imagined by Web giants. On these occasions, you will  carry out code, performance and security audits as well as architecture studies.  ➔ Writing reusable, testable, and efficient code  ➔ Ensuring high performance and responsiveness to any technical requests  ➔ You are familiar with Agile / Scrum Methodologies and will be part of daily stand up,  backlog management, demos, retros, etc.  ➔ Ensuring not only development but also testing, maintainance, and support  STILL YOU:  ✔ You have at least 3-5 years of hands-on experience in Front-end development (AngularJS, ReactJS etc) and Back end (NodeJS, Java, Python, Clojure, Databases, PHP, etc.), or mobile (Swift for IOS, Android, native or hybrid) development.  ✔ You are interested in designing scalable, reliable and secure softwares using a  combination of different languages, frameworks, libraries and technical environment.  ✔ You like to work in all phases of a rapid product development lifecycle: You are familiar  with Agile Methodologies, Scrum, Kanban, and interested in learning more about Design  Thinking, Lean Start-up, TDD, BDD, or XP.  ✔ You are communicative with good sense of idealism and pragmatism.  ✔ You’re endlessly curious and thrive in an environment where you’re continually  learning and solving new problems.  Your role at PALO IT  You will be invited to take part in R&D works done within our Practices. You will have the chance to assist or be a speaker at must-attend international IT conferences. You will have the opportunity to write articles for our Blog or specialized press. Genuine ambassador of PALO IT, you will present our offers and take an active role in the development of the company.  Your technical environment  # Digital projects: web, tablet and mobile applications # Understanding of systems engineering concepts, ability to conduct cost/benefit analysis, Business case studies, translating and simplifying requirements, management and communication # JavaScript : Angular, React, Node, Backbone, HTML5; CSS3 # Agile and Scrum methodologies  WHY US ?  PALO IT is a learning company guided by the values of Agility and craftsmanship offering you multiple possibilities to express yourself and enhance your skills through :  # Our monthly BarCamps; # Our R&D projects; # Our Practices (Development, Architecture, Lean & Agile, Big Data); # Our missions high added value missions in France and internationally that will make you discover new horizons; # Our participation to and sponsoring of major technical events; # And our parties parties = FUN !  Firmly focusing on international expansion, we have offices in France, Hong Kong, Singapore, Sydney and Mexico, meet us to continue this growth !  If you like what you just read, we’d love to have a chat with you!Requirements✔ You have at least 1 to 2 years of hands-on experience in ReactJS and other Front-end development (Javascript, VueJS, MeteorJS, Clojurescript, AngularJS, etc) and Back end (NodeJS, Java, Python, Clojure, Databases, etc.), or mobile (Swift for IOS, Android, native or hybrid) development. ✔     You are passionate about new technologies and digital innovation. ✔     Experience in building and delivering web / mobile business solutions (e.g. in Banking, Travel, Finance, Healthcare, Information industries) and Restful API projects. ✔     Has a very good knowledge with deploying and maintaining a database (MongoDB, Postgres, Redis, Cassandra) and implementing software in at least one of these programming languages: python, javascript(node.js), java, C#, perl, ruby. Some experience with orchestration and configuration tools such as Rancher, Kubernetes, Swarm, Ansible, and Chef will be a plus. ✔     Practical knowledge and experience with Unified Modeling Language (UML) for business modeling (work flows) and object modelling. ✔     Proven/previous experience with Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment and DevOps. ✔     Strong critical thinker with problem solving aptitude. ✔     Ability to communicate effectively in written documents and oral presentations, explaining concepts clearly to audiences at various levels of technical knowledge. ✔     General banking knowledge or Banking knowledge related to Wealth Management / Private banking is a plus. ✔     You have already worked in an Agile environment driven by Time-To-Market, you have good communication skills, are independent and able to make significant proposals. But most of all, you love CODING! Share your GitHub account!
